about_the_game:
This demo features the following from the full game :
  • Tutorial
  • Single player 2 VS 2 match in 1 set and 5 points at the Six Coconut Beach.
detailed_description:
This demo features the following from the full game :
  • Tutorial
  • Single player 2 VS 2 match in 1 set and 5 points at the Six Coconut Beach.

name: Highline Volleyball VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / 1050 TI or AMD RX480 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5600 XT 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Participate in a 2 VS 2 single player volleyball match game mode in 2 or 5 points in this demo and improve your volleyball skills and strategy thanks to virtual reality and realistic interactions.
